content.question: In the second paragraph, the speaker characterizes herself as being

choices.label: aware that her motives include revenge
undaunted in the face of prejudice
uncertain about the quality of her writing

content.answer: undaunted in the face of prejudice

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
